mapper.select: SELECT rc.id, DATE_FORMAT(r.reservation_date,'%Y.%c.%d') AS reservation_date, rc.comment, rc.score, r.reservation_name, f.save_file_name as comment_image FROM reservation_info AS r INNER JOIN reservation_user_comment AS rc ON r.id = rc.reservation_info_id LEFT JOIN reservation_user_comment_image AS rci ON rc.id = rci.reservation_user_comment_id LEFT JOIN file_info AS f ON rci.file_id = f.id WHERE r.display_info_id = #{displayInfoId} ORDER BY rc.id DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{pagingLimit};
